title: Software Developer 1
responsibilities: Led the implementation of a robust CI/CD pipeline responsible for automating build, testing, and deployment processes, resulting in accelerated development cycles and improved code reliability

Designed the entire system architecture for the dashboard and led its frontend development using Next.js and TypeScript.
Successfully integrated caching mechanisms using Redis, enhancing application performance and reducing response times for improved user experiences.

title: Software Development Intern

Created reusable widgets and rule chains on thingsboard platform.

Played a key role in constructing a scalable backend system to support AI model training and deployment using Node.js. Employed expertise in Node.js and associated technologies to fine-tune system performance and optimize model accuracy.

title: Frontend Intern

title: Frontend Intern
